title: U.S. rejects international AI oversight at U.N. General Assembly
description: The United States clashed with world leaders over artificial intelligence at the United Nations General Assembly this week.
content:

title: Accenture says it will lay off employees who cannot adapt to AI as it doubles down on upskilling
description: Accenture is moving forward with a significant restructuring initiative in 2025, prioritising artificial intelligence and upskilling. Key executives have outlined cost-saving measures, workforce expansion in AI roles, and a strict approach to reskilling staff unable to adapt to new technological demands. The company has seen notable revenue growth amidst this shift.
content: Accenture is taking decisive steps in 2025 to reshape its workforce and business model around artificial intelligence, as leaders highlighted during a recent earnings call. The company, which reported annual revenues of $69.7 billion, a 7 per cent in... [3145 chars]

title: Balancing Technology in Education: Human First, Tech Forward
description: At the recent STTAR Global Education Conference, experts stressed the importance of using technology as a tool rather than a teacher. They highlighted the necessity for schools to educate children on the cautious use of artificial intelligence, emphasizing human connection over digital reliance.
